tool.name: SoilParam

param.name: Output_folder
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and folder name where output from this tool will be stored.

param.name: Input_shapefile
param.dialogReference: Specift the path and filename where the input shapefile is located.

param.name: Calculate_PTF
param.displayname: Calculate soil moisture content using PTF?
param.dialogReference: Tick this box if you wish to calculate soil moisture content using a PTF.

param.name: PTF_of_choice
param.expression: Nguyen et al. (2014) | Adhikary et al. (2008) | Rawls et al. (1982) | Saxton et al. (1986) | Hall et al. (1977) | Gupta and Larson (1979) | Batjes (1996) | Saxton and Rawls (2006) | Pidgeon (1972) | Lal (1978) | Aina and Periaswamy (1985) | Manrique and Jones (1991) | van Den Berg et al. (1997) | Tomasella and Hodnett (1998) | Reichert et al. (2009) - Sand, silt, clay, OM, BD | Reichert et al. (2009) - Sand, silt, clay, BD | Botula Manyala (2013) | Shwetha and Varija (2013) | Dashtaki et al. (2010) | Santra et al. (2018)
param.dialogReference: Select an equation from the dropdown box below.

param.name: Calculate_VG
param.displayname: Calculate soil moisture content using van Genuchten model?
param.dialogReference: Tick this box if you wish to calculate water content using the van Genuchten model.

param.name: VG_of_choice
param.expression: Wosten et al. (1999) | Vereecken et al. (1989) | Zacharias and Wessolek (2007) | Weynants et al. (2009) | Dashtaki et al. (2010) | Hodnett and Tomasella (2002)
param.dialogReference: Select an equation to determine the van Genuchten parameters from the dropdown box below.

param.name: Calculate_Ksat
param.dialogReference: Tick this box if you wish to calculate the saturated hydraulic conductivity in addition to the water content.

param.name: Ksat_of_choice
param.expression: Cosby et al. (1984) | Puckett et al. (1985) | Jabro (1992) | Campbell and Shiozawa (1994) | Ferrer Julia et al. (2004) - Sand | Ferrer Julia et al. (2004) - Sand, clay, OM | Ahuja et al. (1989) | Minasny and McBratney (2000) | Brakensiek et al. (1984)
param.dialogReference: Select an equation to determine saturated hydraulic conductivity from the dropdown box below.

param.name: Carbon_content
param.displayname: Carbon: Does your dataset contain organic carbon or organic matter?
param.dialogReference: Specify if your input soil shapefile contains carbon information as organic carbon or organic matter.

param.name: Rerun_tool
param.displayname: Rerun tool (will continue previous run from the point where any errors occurred)

tool.summary: This tool takes a soil shapefile as input and uses commonly-measured soil information to calculate water content, van Genuchten parameters, and saturated hydraulic conducitivity using soil pedotransfer functions and models. The output folder will contain a copy of the input soil shapefile with new fields added containing the information calculated by the PTFs and equations.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool takes a soil shapefile as input and uses commonly-measured soil information to calculate water content, van Genuchten parameters, and saturated hydraulic conducitivity using soil pedotransfer functions and models. The output folder will contain a copy of the input soil shapefile with new fields added containing the information calculated by the PTFs and equations.
